review: Works as expected. Just expect a charges for most things
author: Hollee Goode

review: Why did I wait so long to get this.  So easy to use even the children think so ! Love this item
author: Karen McCleary

review: I love it!!!! It was fast and easy to set up, I use it everyday!!!
author: Shkir

review: Best thing I've bought in a long time! It's easy to install and works exactly as described. I'm very happy with this product!
author: Amanda

review: Glad I didn't pay $39 for it. Half the time on boot up there is a network error. Plex app pauses 2-5 seconds several times throughout streaming of a movie. But for $19 it's worth keeping around to hope they fix these early issues.
author: JD

review: Great product. Fast working with no issues. Got it as a gift for a friend and they love it over their Roku!
author: DatGuy Junior
